channel.title: year-in-review on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in year-in-review on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: Year in Review: OONI in 2022
item.description: As the end of 2022 approaches, we publish this post to share some OONI highlights from the last year. We also share some of the things weâ€™ll be working on in 2023! OONI Team OONI Probe New OONI Probe experiments New Test Lists Editor OONI Run improvements OONI Probe Web prototype OONI data 1 billion measurements

item.title: Year in Review: OONI in 2021
item.description: In light of the ongoing global COVID-19 pandemic, 2021 continued to be a challenging year for everyone. Yet, several exciting things happened in the censorship measurement world. In this post, we share some OONI highlights from 2021, as well as some upcoming OONI projects for 2022! OONI Probe Automated OONI Probe testing New Debian package for OONI Probe New OONI Probe Command Line Interface for Linux and macOS

item.title: Year in Review: OONI in 2020
item.description: In light of the global COVID-19 pandemic, 2020 has been a challenging year for everyone. Yet, several exciting things happened in the censorship measurement world. In this post, we share some OONI highlights from 2020, as well as some upcoming OONI projects for 2021! OONI Probe New OONI Probe Desktop App for Windows and macOS New OONI Probe measurement engine OONI Run usability study
